channel.title: Stickscape Dev team Recruiting
channel.description:
Yes, its time to work for stickscape. I have been working on it for A month now but i never have much time to work on it. i have the client and server working =) but i cannot change some things and need some bug fixing/website coding/forums!
Application form:
[b]Applying for:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]If experience, proof:[/b] [b]Why id be a good canidate:[/b]
Here are the jobs:
[b][u]The usual[/u][/b] Server coding Client coding Bug support Forum support/Mod/building Website scripting
[u][b][i]and more!!![/i][/b][/u] Website Hosting <--Wow thats new! Jarring Model editing?? <--The theme is stickscape PM me for details Picture Designing
For website scripting, Forum support/Mod/Building I need you to either AIM me @ ageorgetheplant@aol.com or pm me (its because of rules) Dont want this locked after all.
[b][u]Spots open[/u][/b] Website hosting ~free~
Jarring ~free~
Model editing ~free~
Picture disigning ~free~
Server coding ME ~free~ ~free~ ~free~
Client coding ME ~free~ ~free~ ~free~ ~free~
Website scripting ~free~ ~free~ ~free~
Bug support ~free~ ~free~ ~free~
Forum mod/global mod ~free~ ~free~ ~free~
~thanks, Karuto~
